entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix `-Wunsafe-buffer-usage` warnings #81577
  • Dotnet-counter and other tools for specifying meter and ActivitySource names should support namespace wildcards #81574
  • Crossgen hangs and crashes on MacOs #81570
  • [wasm] `SteppingIntoLibrarySymbolsLoadedFromSymbolServerRemoveSymbolServerAndStepAgain` fails intermittently on CI #81569
    8.0.0
  • HostApplicationBuilder doesn't validate DependencyInjection in Development environment if DisableDefaults=true #81566
  • [JIT] Question: typeof(T).Name doesn't become a constant? #81564
  • [MONO][TEST] runtime-llvm pipeline is not working #81563
    8.0.0
  • [wasi] Enabling icu in wasi.proj breaks tests #81560
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `System.Linq.Expressions.Tests` - `memory access out of bounds` #81558
  • Console app wont load if AspNetCore runtime is not installed #81554
  • JsonSerializer.Serialize an anonymous type, with duplicate nested names throws an unexpected exception #81550
  • SslStream_NegotiateClientCertificateAsyncTls13_Succeeds fails on non-portable builds with OpenSSL 3.0 #81546
    8.0.0
  • Unexpectedly uncaught exception in Microsoft.VisualBasic FileSystem GetLongPath #81544
  • Microsoft.DotNet.ApiCompat failing with RegexMatchTimeoutException in #81543
  • SqlException: "No column name was specified for column 1 of 't'" on IQueryable.Count() with Skip and Take #81542
  • [API Proposal]: Add support in NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAs for packageName and cancellationToken #81537
  • Advancing Metrics in .NET #81534
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 29 Regressions on 1/27/2023 11:43:56 PM #81549
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 5 Regressions on 1/27/2023 2:26:56 PM #81551
  • Regressions in System.Collections.Tests.Perf_PriorityQueue<String, String> #81553
  • JIT/opt/Compares/compares should seemingly not be passing file-check on arm64 #81531
  • [mono][aot] Preserve P/Invoked symbols when stripping #81530
    8.0.0
  • High lock contention in HttpConnectionPoolManager #81529
  • Wrong line numbers in exception stack trace on macOS/arm64 #81526
    Future
  • Reconsider version checks in collections? #81523
    Future
  • [JIT] X64 - Support containment for instructions `shlx`, `sarx`, `shrx` #81522
    8.0.0
  • [JIT] X64 - Possible comparison optimization using `and` with a small type #81520
    Future
  • Arm64 CI machines failing #81519
  • [JIT] X64 - Use containment to use memory operands for `blsi`, `blsmsk`, and `blsr` #81515
    8.0.0
  • [JIT] X64 - Recognize patterns to emit `bextr` and `bzhi` #81514
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [release/8.0-preview1] clang-9 causing build failures in linux arm64 #81555
    8.0.0
  • .NET 7 WCF Client throws exception deserializing response from .NET Framework 4.7.2 WCF Server when the response has a double with a decimal point #79092
  • XmlBinaryReader.ReadElementContentAsDouble() double.NaN deserialization issue .net7 #79056
  • VS Code - Cannot debug blazor wasm client projetc : Unable to lauch browser "The URL's protocol must be one of ws, wss or ws+inix" #80376
  • Is there any way to change Transaction's MaxTimeout or any plan to make possible it? #1418
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add a "CustomData" property to JsonPropertyInfo. #81502
  • stop linking wasm native references with --allow-undefined to warn from bugged behavior #80132
  • Make it possible to disable the built-in HTTP client logging #81540
  • Introduce symbol stripping build task for HelloiOS sample app #80977
    8.0.0
  • URI.TryCreate Does not correctly parse mailto protocol multiple to addresses #80799
  • missleading error net_io_invalidasyncresult #79700
    Future
  • Not able to access External server from inside container #80897
  • [pgo] Assertion failed '((-slop) <= diff) && (diff <= slop)' during 'Compute edge weights (2, false)' #77450
    8.0.0
  • How to resolve IL2026? #80374
  • Shouldn't a JsonIgnore property be included in JsonExtensionData property during deserialzation? #81521
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'value != 0' in 'System.Tests.DoubleTests_GenericMath:GetExponentShortestBitLengthTest()' during 'Do value numbering' #81460
  • Vector<T>.Zero.Equals(vec) produces less ideal code than vec == Vector<T>.Zero #67500
    Future
  • Suboptimal Codegen for Vector128.AsVector128(Vector2) #69298
    Future
  • JIT: Optimize "and" of small type with larger constant #7288
    Future
  • [RyuJIT] Integer Promotion Elimination on GT_CAST #8695
    Future
  • JIT stores a register in memory and taking it back while it can be avoided #40264
    Future
  • FileVersionInfo.FileVersion abnormal for C:\system32\notepad.exe #79077
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Use eager evaluation when configuring the JsonTypeInfo type graph. #81576
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Implement more opcodes in the jiterpreter #81575
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Suppress clang-16 warnings #81573
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix juxtaposed command - correct value is noted in eng\build.ps1 #81572
    community-contribution
  • Fix asserts fired during diag testing #81571
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Respect HostApplicationBuilderSettings.Args when DisableDefaults=true #81568
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [Mono] Enable AOT to print out the list of compiled methods #81567
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Remove AggressiveInlining from XxHash128.HashLength0To16 #81565
    area-System.IO
  • JIT: remove cheap preds #81562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move all of the ref-pack generators to use the "LatestVS" Roslyn build so they don't pull in prebuilts in source-build #81561
    source-build, area-Infrastructure, dev-innerloop
  • Improve ConcurrentDictionary performance, in particular for strings #81557
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • CI: Update darc dependency to track emsdk manifest name change #81556
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Add direct pinvoke module variations #81548
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add basic support for folding SIMD intrinsics #81547
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump non-existent Win10 ARM64 helix queue to Win11 #81545
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.4
  • Try to minimally light up Vector2, Vector3, Quaternion, and Plane for Mono SIMD #81541
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • . #81539
  • Fix generic parameter data flow validation in NativeAOT #81532
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Adjust workaround for event source resource stripping #81528
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Create BitArray.HasAllSet() and .HasAnySet(). #81527
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Avoid scaning the used region if there are no free units #81525
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Unify type instantiations in reflection emit #81518
    area-System.Reflection
  • Add a simple size test #81517
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: change profile slop assert to a jitdump note #81377
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow inlining for ldsfld + value-type #78736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Introduce designated direct pinvokes to mono aot compiler #79721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/8.0-preview1] Fix ROOTFS_DIR for arm64 container in pipeline-with-resources.yml #81559
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • JIT: build pred lists when we first build the flow graph #81524
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Allow users to control behavior of undefined symbols #80495
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Introduce non-global symbol stripping in MonoAOTCompiler msbuild task #81361
    area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Delete JIT disasm output in test wrappers before running FileCheck #81538
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Tests: skip some tests on systems that don't support SHA1 signatures, like RHEL9. #81465
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Install workload manifests in sdk band version derived from the #81461
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] CI: fix the new runtime-wasm-dbgtests pipeline #81513
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, area-Debugger-mono
  • Pass -pie and -no-pie to the linker #81533
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix build for FreeBSD arm64 w/NativeAOT #81510
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove types deriving from JsonTypeInfo<T> and mark as sealed. #81306
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • [browser] javascript build cleanup #81212
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Improve the codegen of the vector accelerated `System.Numerics.*` types #81335
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Ensure that we don't try to constant fold BSF(0) or BSR(0) #81516
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Consider method accessibility in interface resolution #81409
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Delete `!CODEGEN_CPP` ifdefs from NAOT smoke tests #81474
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: build pred lists first #81448
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Remove JsonMetadataServices dependency from DeserializeAsyncEnumerable #81579
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512, 8.0.0
  • Run nativeaot tests in helix #81439
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve XmlDictionaryWriter UTF8 encoding performance #73336
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Improve Binary Xml (XmlDictionaryWriter) performance #71478
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Modernize XmlUTF8TextWriter with u8/inline out's. #75812
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Reduce contention for Datacontract Serialization #73893
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Allow source-build to set UsingToolMicrosoftNetCompilers property #81180
  • [wasm][debug] Avoid pausing on breakpoint while invoking methods. #81162
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [wasm][debugger]Adding stack info to the exception details when evaluating expressions #81440
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Fix function pointer check #80927
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • Promote Tier0 methods with loops to InstrumentedTier0 #81051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAOT instruction for NixOS #81485
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Implement synch block fast paths in managed #81380
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Initial work to port EventPipe library to NativeAOT #80382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Enable dedup by default for iOS and tvOS #81319
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Use MemoryExtensions.Count in a few places #81325
    area-Meta
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2103288 #81359
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] wasi: Enable library tests on CI #81052
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, wasi
  • [release/7.0] Target lower glibc for Linux arm64 #80866
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Support targeting iOS platforms with ILCompiler #81476
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup intrinsinsics + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Make DotNetBuildFromSource work in more cases. #81480
    community-contribution
  • Add CollectionsMarshal.SetCount(list, count) #77794
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix TarWriter.TarEntry exception when adding file whose Unix group owner does not exist in the system #81139
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Tar, 7.0.4
  • [EXPERIMENTAL - will be reverted] Opt-in for msbuild server in CI #79444
  • JIT: Support containing compares in GT_SELECT for xarch (i.e. start emitting cmov instructions) #81267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • diagnostic to detect malformed format strings in lsg template message #81503
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Create AND chains in bool optimizer pass #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable same set of analyzers for C# tools that are used by the repo #81073
    area-Meta
  • NativeAOT Fully implements warning suppressions logic #81266
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [browser] PGO AOT samples #81221
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0][browser][http] Fix blocking of streaming response and abort #81092
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • Do not print stack trace if error reading crashReportJsonFile #81467
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Append version to RID only with valid characters #81497
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Harden and re-enable DualMode socket tests #80715
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Add new proposed API to Ancillary.Interop #81063
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
